titleStmt.title: The history of Russia, or, The government of the Emperour of Muscovia with the manners & fashions of the people of that countrey / by G. Fletcher, sometime fellow of Kings Colledge in Cambridge and employed in the embassie thither.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Giles, 1549?-1611.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
